allCourses.name: Introduction to Web Development
allCourses.description: Learn the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This course is perfect for beginners who want to build their first website.

allCourses.name: Front-End Web Development with React
allCourses.description: Dive deep into front-end development with React. Learn how to build dynamic and interactive user interfaces using React.js, one of the most popular JavaScript libraries.

allCourses.name: Back-End Development with Node.js
allCourses.description: Master the back-end of web development with Node.js. This course covers server-side programming, building RESTful APIs, and integrating with databases.

allCourses.name: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
allCourses.description: Become a full-stack web developer by learning both front-end and back-end technologies. This comprehensive bootcamp covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.

allCourses.name: Responsive Web Design
allCourses.description: Learn how to create responsive websites that look great on any device. This course covers techniques for making your website adaptable to different screen sizes and orientations.

allCourses.name: Advanced JavaScript and Web Performance
allCourses.description: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level and learn how to optimize web performance. This course covers advanced JavaScript techniques and performance best practices.

top5Courses.name: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
top5Courses.description: Become a full-stack web developer by learning both front-end and back-end technologies. This comprehensive bootcamp covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.
